State Strategic Stockpile Act of 2023
To amend the Public Health Service Act to extend the authorization of appropriations for grants for State strategic stockpiles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
State Strategic Stockpile Act of 2023
This bill reauthorizes through FY2028 a pilot program that provides support to states, or consortia of states, to establish, expand, or maintain stockpiles of drugs, vaccines, and other medical supplies necessary to respond to a declared public health emergency.
